module.name: physical_unit_2d_design_view
module.keywords: module, component shape, component location, two dimensional, electrical, electronic, design

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information that describes the two dimensional shape of a component and that describes the two dimensional location of a component where the product context is a physical design view. The shape of the component is provided only for the cases where the shape of the component is not available as a property of the definition of the component.
